bringToLife.title: We’ll Bring Your Appliances Back to Life
bringToLife.desc: Don’t let a broken appliance disrupt your daily routine. Rembyttehnika offers comprehensive repair solutions for all major models. Transparent pricing, attentive service, and quality assurance — your appliances are in safe hands.
bringToLife.warrantyDesc: We offer a warranty on all our repairs so you can feel confident.
bringToLife.availabilityDesc: You can contact us during working hours — we’re always ready to help.
bringToLife.qualityDesc: We use only original parts and provide a warranty on repairs.
bringToLife.bookingDesc: Visit our workshop — we’ll accept your appliance without long lines.

ourServices.title: Comprehensive Household Appliance Repair Services
ourServices.desc: We offer a full range of repair services for all major household appliances. If your coffee machine stops brewing delicious coffee or your microwave no longer heats food, our specialists will quickly find a solution and bring your appliance back to life.
ourServices.types: We repair all major household appliance models

features.certifiedDesc: Our specialists can diagnose and repair any household appliance.
features.localDesc: Hundreds of satisfied customers trust us for our professionalism, punctuality, and honest service.
features.pricingDesc: No hidden fees. We provide an accurate estimate before any work begins.

we_bring_appliances_back: We Bring Your Appliances Back to Life
we_provide_comprehensive_repair: Don't let broken appliances disrupt your daily routine. Rembytekhnika offers comprehensive repair services for all major brands and models. Transparent pricing, convenient online booking, and a satisfaction guarantee — so you can have peace of mind about your appliances.
warranties_description: Every repair comes with an official warranty — you know exactly what you're paying for and what you'll receive.
service_24_7_description: Our specialists quickly diagnose issues and accurately identify the cause — no guesswork or unnecessary expenses.
convenient_booking_description: We're in touch throughout the entire repair process — from your first inquiry to when your appliance is fully operational. No need to worry.
quality_parts_description: We use only branded components and strictly follow manufacturer standards — your device works like new.
featured_description: Discover how Rembyttekhnika helps thousands of families with appliance repairs. Browse our recent projects to see the quality and professionalism that set our services apart.
weAre: We’re Your All-in-One Appliance Repair Solution

pp.this_privacy_policy: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the 'Policy') governs the collection, use, storage, and disclosure of information provided by users of web applications and services.
pp.committed_to_maintaining: Rembyttekhnika is committed to ensuring the confidentiality and protection of personal data in compliance with applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other international standards.
pp.company_may_collect: We may collect the following types of data:
pp.provided_voluntarily: Personal data: Name, email address, phone number, and other data voluntarily provided by the user through forms.
pp.technical_data: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser data, operating system, and website behavior.
pp.cookie: Cookies: To enhance the user experience and analyze application performance.
pp.data_collected: Data is collected for the following purposes:
pp.improving_the_quality: Improving the quality of web applications and services.
pp.stores_personal: We store personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes of its processing and in accordance with the user's country's legislation. After achieving the purposes, the data is deleted or anonymized.
pp.does_not_transfer_data: The company does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
pp.engaging_service_providers: When engaging third-party service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics) who are obligated to maintain data confidentiality.
pp.data_transfer_countries: In case of data transfer to other countries, we ensure compliance with international privacy standards.
pp.depending_on_laws: Depending on the legislation of their country of residence, users may have the following rights:
pp.request_correction: Request correction or deletion of data.
pp.exercise_rights: To exercise their rights, users may contact us using the details provided on the website.
pp.company_takes_measures: We take technical and organizational measures to ensure data security, including:
pp.restricting_access: Restricting access to data to authorized employees only.
pp.company_reserves_right: We reserve the right to amend this Policy. Updates are published on the Company's official website. Users are encouraged to periodically check for changes.
pp.company_operates: We operate in accordance with international privacy standards and process data in compliance with the laws of the countries where users are located. For cross-border data transfers, mechanisms ensuring data protection, such as Standard Contractual Clauses, are used.
pp.have_any_questions: If you have any questions or inquiries related to this Policy, you can contact us using the details provided on the website.
